alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Frederick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 10:47PM EDT until March 30 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Light wintry mix. A coating of snow and sleet, and up to a tenth of an inch of ice from freezing rain. * WHERE...Western Maryland, Frederick and Clarke Counties of Virginia, and portions of eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
